title: Black Boxes
body: Hello I'm running into an issue where when I'm using the LOL Client I get these black boxes that cover up part of the screen. This happens commonly when I'm in Champ Select so sometimes I can't even see what champion I'm picking or I can't change masteries/runes so I end up going into the game with the wrong stuff. I can't seem to figure out what the problem could be. I have tried doing a full repair to no avail. This only happens with this game and only with the LOL Client itself and not in game. Any help here would be appreciated.

replies.body: I have the same issue. I tried a repair and my connection is flawless in game. This issue didn't start until I was forced to switch to the new client

I'm having a similar problem on my Pbe account.

I was editing runes this morning and the client turned into a quilt-like bunch of black squares.
They kinda re-appear one at a time if you shake the mouse cursor over the client right?

I have no idea what's causing it or how to stop it unfortunately. :(

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ftMNmGne,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-18T18:22:02.430+0000)

Yeah exactly. Sometimes they reappear if I move my mouse over the area, sometimes it doesn't though. Lately I've just been restarting the client when it happens and that fixes it for a little while sometimes but it seems to be quite random. Never had the issue with the Legacy Client...

I know it appeared on Legacy too, but the boxes were larger since the client had less components.

>Sometimes they reappear if I move my mouse over the area, sometimes it doesn't though.

Yes, this^

Idk what it is either; very random.
Hopefully if people keep reporting it we'll be able to find a pattern.

Did it always happen for you when adjusting Runes/Masteries or also when you just get into select?  Asking since for me I was sitting in Collection editing runes.

Sorry to hear about these black screens.  :(  It can happen from either connection problems that can't download assets, or a problem with game files failing to render.  See if running a repair fixes that up for you, otherwise the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help!
